name: Last Imagination
description:
Final group project for a university game dev course.

Made using Unity.

CONTROLS

WASD to move

Mouse to aim and shoot (hold down left-click)

1, 2, 3 keys to switch weapons (wand light shows which spell is selected)

GAMEPLAY

Kill monsters to get points

Tougher monsters award more points

Get enough points to advance to the next stage!
